error_auth_description: There is a problem with your credentials. Please sign in again.
error_fact_pong_1: Pong was one of the first commercial video games, released in 1972!
error_fact_pong_2: The original Pong featured just two paddles and a single ball.
error_fact_pong_3: Allan Alcorn created Pong as a simple practice project.
error_fact_pong_4: The first Pong cabinet was tested inside a Chuck E. Cheese restaurant.
error_fact_pong_5: Pong machines were so popular they often overflowed with coins before breaking down!
friends_header_description: Enter a username to send a friend request. Play a match or start a chat instantly!
friends_login_required_description: Please sign in to view and manage your friends list.
friends_none: You don't have any friends yet.
friends_toast_action_failure: The action could not be completed.
friends_toast_self_request: You can't send a friend request to yourself.

login_hero_subtitle: Welcome to the legendary Pong experience

settings_generic_update_success: Your information has been updated successfully.

settings_subtitle: Manage the appearance and security preferences of your account from a single place.

signup_error_409_message: An account with this email already exists. Try signing in.

signup_success_message: Your account was created successfully. Redirecting to the sign-in screen...
twofa_disable_error_message: Disable action failed. Please try again.
twofa_disable_success_message: You will now sign in with password only.
twofa_enable_error_message: The code may be invalid or expired. Please try again.
twofa_enable_success_message: Your account is now protected with an extra security layer.
twofa_login_required_description: Please sign in before managing two-factor authentication.
twofa_page_subtitle: Add an extra layer of protection to your account.
twofa_qr_description: Open your authenticator app, add a new account and scan the QR code.
twofa_status_disabled_description: Follow the steps below to set up two-factor authentication for extra security.
twofa_status_enabled_description: Your account is protected with an additional layer. You can disable it at any time.
twofa_step_enter_code: Enter the 6-digit code generated by the app to verify.
twofa_step_generate_qr: Begin the setup and generate the QR code.
twofa_step_scan_qr: Scan the QR code with your authenticator app.
twofa_tip_backup_codes: Store the backup codes somewhere safe.
twofa_tip_device_change: If you change devices you will need to set it up again.
validation_avatar_file_type: Invalid file type. Only JPG, PNG or GIF files are accepted.
validation_email_invalid: Please enter a valid email address.
validation_file_size: File size must be less than {{size}}MB.
validation_form_missing_footer: Please fix these fields and try saving again.
validation_form_missing_subtitle: Check the following fields to complete the form
validation_fullname_chars: Full name can only contain letters and spaces.
validation_fullname_length: Full name must be between 2 and 50 characters.
validation_password_complexity: Password must include at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, and one number.
validation_password_length_min: Password must be at least 6 characters.
validation_password_new_different: New password must be different from the current password.
validation_username_chars: Username may only include English letters, numbers, and underscores.
validation_username_length: Username must be between 3 and 20 characters.
view_settings_language_change_info_descr: Language changes take effect immediately across the application.
view_settings_language_description: Choose your preferred language for the interface.
view_settings_language_success_message: Your language preference has been updated to "{{language}}".
view_settings_theme_success_message: Your theme preference has been updated to "{{theme}}".
dashboard_logged_out_description: Experience the ultimate Pong game with real-time multiplayer action, tournaments, and social features.
dashboard_feature_realtime_description: Play against players from around the world in real-time matches with smooth gameplay.
dashboard_feature_tournaments_descriptio: Compete in exciting tournaments and climb the leaderboards to become the ultimate Pong champion.
dashboard_feature_social_description: Connect with friends, chat during games, and build your social network within the Pong community.
dashboard_cta_subtitle: Create your account today and start your journey to becoming a Pong master.
